abstract: Aid to Brit: Bundles for Brit rept on aid; Med and Surgical Supply Com rept; Foster Parents Plan for War Children and Internatl Comm to Aid Refugee Children cooperate in housing projects for women and children air raid victims
snippet: An increasingly large flow of war relief supplies, including those of medical variety, is going to Great Britain from American organizations, it was disclosed by their announcements yesterday....

headline.main: BRITISH AID GROUP SETS WEEKLY MARK; Bundles for Britain Sent 367 Crates of Knitted Goods Last Week--Has 500 Units STARTS CHRISTMAS DRIVE Medical and Surgical Supply Committee Seeks 100 FirstAid Outfits for Shipment

lead_paragraph: An increasingly large flow of war relief supplies, including those of medical variety, is going to Great Britain from American organizations, it was disclosed by their announcements yesterday.
